```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
stats <- read_csv(here::here("esselt21/nba_salary_module/exploration/stats.csv"))

statsnew <- read_csv(here::here("esselt21/nba_salary_module/exploration/statsnew.csv"))
```

```{r}
stats <-
  stats |>
  filter(Season < 2022)
```

```{r}
players <-
  stats |>
  filter(Player %in% names & Tm == "TOT")
```

```{r}
stats <-
  stats |>
  filter(Player %in% names & Tm != "TOT")
```

```{r}
write_csv(stats, here::here("esselt21/nba_salary_module/exploration/statsnew.csv"))
```
